participant_1.background:
I'm going to hike some of the Appalachian Trail with my dragon friend.
I enjoy music to connect with my family and friends, even though we live far apart.
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I remember spending hours riding horses with my dad when I was a kid.
I'm not rich, but I'm passionate about my writing and I'm learning more about my heritage every day.

i have problems chewing my food.
my wife hates me , she thinks i am lazy and poor.
I'm not disclosing my weight as it is a personal matter.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch horror movies and read horror books. I also like to write horror stories.
Cool, me too! I love The Walking Dead.
Yes, it's one of my favorites! I'm also a big fan of Stephen King.
I love Stephen King too! I'm currently reading his book The Outsider.
I haven't read that one yet. How is it?
It's really good! It's about a detective who is investigating a murder. It's very suspenseful.
That sounds really good! I'll have to check it out.
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! What do you write?
I write short stories and novels.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a writer.
You should go for it! It's a lot of fun.
